Translations.Text: Dui renlei de qingsuan linjinle, dan tamen [xianzai] haishi shuhu dayi, bu yu zhongshi.
Mei dang [“gulanjing” zhong] you xin de qishi [gaojie] cong tamen de zhu [an la] jianglin tamen, tamen zong shi chaoxiaozhe tingqu.
Bu yi zhe de xinzhong chongman xienian, tamen mimi xieshang shuo:“Zhe zhishi tong nimen yiyang de fanren, nimen mingzhi shi moshu hai yao jieshou [shuncong] ma?”
Ta [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo de zhu zhidao tiandi jian suo shuo de yiqie. Ta shi quan wen de, quanzhi de [zhu].”

Dan tamen shuo:“Zhe [“gulanjing” zhong yi jiang shi mu sheng de jing wen] shi yige za meng. Bu, shi ta weizao de yanci! Bu, ta shi yi wei shiren! Rang ta xiang yiqian bei paiqian de shizhemen yiyang xianshi women yi zhong jixiang ba!”
[Jinguan wo ceng jiang shi tamen jixiang], dan zai tamen zhiqian wo suo huimie de chengshi zhong, meiyou yige quexin jixiang de.[Xianzai] tamen hui quexin ma?
Zai ni [mu sheng] zhiqian, wo ceng paiqian xuduo ren [zuo shizhe] bing qishi tamen. Jiaru nimen bu zhidao, nimen keyi qingjiao shou gaojie zhe [“tao la te” he “yin ji lei” de xuezhe].
Wo meiyou ba tamen [shizhe] zaocheng bu chi shi wu de shenti, tamen ye bushi yongsheng de.
Ranhou, wo shixianle dui tamen de nuoyan, wo zhengjiule tamen he wo suo yiyu zhe, huimiele chaoyue fadu zhe.
[Renmen a!] Wo que yi jiang shi nimen yi bu jingdian [“gulanjing”], qizhong you dui nimen de gaojie, nandao nimen hai buming li ma?
Wo ceng huimiele xuduo xing bu yi de chengshi [de minzhong], bing zai cihou chuangzaole bie de minzhong.
Mei dang tamen gandao wo de xingfa [jijiang jianglin] shi, tamen turan shitu taozou.
[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen buyao taozou, nimen huiqu xiangshou nimen de shechi shenghuo he haozhai ba! Yibian nimen shoushen wen.”
Tamen jiaohan shuo:“Women zhen gaisi! Women que shi bu yi zhe.”
Tamen de zhe zhong aiming bu hui zhongduan, zhidao wo shi tamen bian cheng haoxiang gang geguo de [zhuangjia] yiyang er xiaoshi.
Wo chuangzao tiandi wanwu, bingfei wei le yule.
Jiaru wo xiang xiaoqian [ru yongyou qi er deng], wo yiding hui zai wo zheli huode xiaoqian, jiaru wo yu zuo.
Bu, wo yi zhenli [“gulanjing”] huiji miuwu [bu xinyang deng], miuwu zao daole huimie, turan xiaoshile. Nimen [dui wo] niezao huangyan [ru wangyan an la you qi er] jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Tiandi jian de yiqie dou shi ta de [an la]; fan zai ta nali de [tianshi], dou chongbai ta, tamen ji bu aoman, ye bu pijuan.
Tamen [tianshi] zhouye zansong ta, hao bu songxie.
Nandao tamen zai da dishang shezhi [chongbai] de zhuzai neng shi sizhe fuhuo ma?
Chu an la wai, jiaru tiandi jian hai you qita ying shou chongbai de zhuzai, name, tiandi biding huimiele. Zanmei an la——baozuo zhi zhu chaojue [zhu]! Ta chaojue yu tamen suo wangyan de.
Ta [an la] suo zuo de shi bu shou zewen de, er tamen [suo zuo de] que shi yao shoushen wen de.

Nandao tamen yao she ta er xuan bai qita zhuzai ma? Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen na chu nimen de zhengju lai ba! Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi dui wo de tongdao de tixing [gaojie], yeshi dui wo zhiqian de renmen de tixing [gaojie].” Dan tamen da duoshu ren haishi buming zhenli, yin'er beiqi ta.
Zai ni [mu sheng] zhiqian, fanshi wo suo paiqian de shizhe, wo du qishi ta:“Chu wo wai, zai meiyouying shou chongbai de zhu, suoyi, nimen zhi neng chongbai wo.”
Tamen shuo:“Pu ci zhi zhu [an la] you ernule.” Zanmei ta chaojue! Bu,[tamen suo wangyan de an la de ernu, ru er sa yu tianshi deng, tamen] zhishi yixie ying shou zunjing de puren.
Tamen bu gan zai ta [an la] qishi qian xian kaikou, tamen zhi feng ta de mingling xingshi.
Ta zhidao tamen zai jinshi [suo fasheng] de shiqing, ye zhidao tamen zai houshi [jiang fasheng] de shiqing, tamen zhi ti ta [an la] suo xiyue zhe qiuqing. Tamen yin kongju er jingwei ta.
Tamen zhong shei gan shuo:“Wo shi ta [an la] zhi wai de ling yi wei zhuzai.” Wo bi yi huo yu huan bao ta. Wo ruci huan bao bu yi zhe.
Nandao bu xinyang zhe bu zhidao ma? Tiandi yuan shi lianjie de zhengti, ranhou, wo shi qi fen kai. Wo yongshui chuangzao yiqie shengming. Nandao tamen bu xiangxin ma?
Wo zai dadishang wengu de anzhi qun shan, yimian tamen sui da di er yaodang. Wo zai da dishang kaipi kuankuo de daolu, yibian tamen huode yindao.
Wo ba tian zaocheng yige anquan de huagai, dan tamen rengran hushi tian de jixiang [ru ri yue fengyun deng].
Shi ta chuangzaole zhouye he ri yue, ge zai ziji de guidao shang yunxing.
Zai ni [mu sheng] zhiqian, wo cong wei ciyu renhe ren yongsheng. Jiaru ni sile, nandao tamen hai neng yongsheng ma?
Mei ren dou jiang changshi siwang [zhu][de ziwei]. Wo jiang yi huo fu kaoyan nimen, nimen dou jiang gui dao wo zheli lai.

Dang bu xinyang zhe kanjian ni [mu sheng] shi, tamen ba ni dang xiaobing.[Tamen shuo]:“Shi ci ren [mu sheng] feibang nimen de zhuzai ma?” Qishi, tamen jiushi jujue zan nian pu ci zhi zhu [an la] de ren.
Rensheng lai jiushi jizao de. Wo jiang zhaoshi nimen wo de jixiang, suoyi, nimen buyao cuicu wo.
Tamen shuo:“Zhege xunuo he shi shixian ne? Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe.”
Jiaru bu xinyang zhe zhidao, na shi tamen jue buneng fangyu ziji de lian bei mian shou huoxing, ye de bu dao renhe yuanzhu,[name, tamen xianzai jiu bu hui fouren an lale].
Bu, fuhuo de shijian jiang turan jianglin [zhu] tamen, shi tamen jinghuang shicuo. Tamen wuneng dikang ta, ye bu bei huanxing.
Zai ni [mu sheng] zhiqian, you xuduo shizhe que yi bei chaoxiao, dan chaoxiao zhe bei ziji suo chaoxiao de [xingfa] baowei zhule.
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Shei neng zhouye baohu nimen mian shou pu ci zhi zhu de xingfa ne?” Qishi, tamen jiushi jujue zan nian tamen de zhu de ren.
Chu wo wai, nandao tamen hai you qita zhuzai neng baohu tamen [mian shou wo de xingfa] ma? Naxie zhuzai ji buneng zijiu, ye buneng ziwei [mian shou wo de xingfa].

Bu, wo shi zhexie ren he tamen de zuxian [zai jinshi zhanshi] xiangle, zhidao tamen de shouming yanchang [dao yige dingqi]. Nandao tamen meiyou kanjian wo zhujian suoxiao [bu xinyang zhe] lingyu nei de jiangtu [er ba ta ciyu xinshi] ma? Nandao tamen shi shengli zhe ma?
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo zhi yi [an la jiang shi wo de] qishi jinggao nimen.” Qishi, dang longzi bei jinggao [zunxing “gulanjing”] shi, tamen shi ting bujian zhaohuan de.
Jiaru tamen zaoshoule ni de zhu de yidian er xingfa, tamen bi shuo:“Women zhen gaisi! Women que shi bu yi zhe.”
Fuhuo ri, wo jiang shezhi gongzheng de tiancheng, renhe ren dou bu shou sihao kuidai. Jishi you yi li jiezi de zhongliang [zhu], wo ye yao qingsuan. Wo zuyi zuo qingsuan zhe.
Wo que yi ci gei mu sa he ha lun bianbie zhen wei de zhunze he guangming [“tao la te”], yiji dui jingwei zhe de gaojie.
Tamen [jingwei zhe] anzhong jingwei tamen de zhu, bing weiju fuhuo de shijian.
Zhe shi wo suo jiang shi de jiqing de gaojie [“gulanjing”], nandao nimen hai yao fouren ma?
Yiqian, wo que yi ci gei yi bu la xin zhengdao [yisilan jiao], wo shi shen zhi ta [duxin wo] de.
Dangshi, ta dui ta de fuqin he zuren shuo:“Nimen suo gongfeng de zhexie suxiang shi shenme?”
Tamen shuo:“Women faxian women de zuxian yeshi [zheyang] chongbai tamen de.”
Ta shuo:“Nimen he nimen de zuxian que shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.”
Tamen shuo:“Ni dui women jiang de shi zhen hua, haishi kaiwanxiao?”
Ta shuo:“Bu, nimen de zhu shi chuangzao tiandi de zhu [an la], wo neng wei ci zuozheng.
Yi an la fashi! Nimen zhuanshen likai hou, wo yiding yao yong jimou cuihui nimen de ouxiang.”
Ranhou, ta ba naxie ouxiang dou da suile, zhi gei tamen liu xia zuida de yige, yibian tamen huilai wen ta.
Tamen shuo:“Shei dui women de shenling zuole zhe jian shi? Shei que shi bu yi zhe.”
Tamen shuo:“Women ting shuo you ge jiao yi bu la xin de qingnian ceng feibangguo tamen.”
Tamen shuo:“Nimen ba ta dai dao zhongren mianqian lai, yibian tamen zuozheng.”
Tamen shuo:“Yi bu la xin a! Shi ni dui women de shenling zuole zhe jian shi ma?”
Ta shuo:“Bu, shi tamen zhong zuida di nage ouxiang zuo de. Nimen wen wen tamen ba! Jiaru tamen hui jianghua.”
Yushi tamen jiu huxiang menxinziwen. Tamen shuo:“Nimen [chongbai ouxiang] dique zuo cuole.”
Ranhou, tamen jinghuang shicuo [shuo]:“Ni dique zhidao zhexie ouxiang shi bu hui jianghua de.”
Ta shuo:“Nandao nimen hai yao she an la er chongbai dui nimen ji wuyi ye wu hai de ouxiang ma?
Pei! Nimen bu gai she an la er chongbai zhexie ouxiang! Nandao nimen buming li ma?”
Tamen shuo:“Jiaru nimen xiang zuo, nimen jiu shao si [zhu] ta ba! Nimen ti nimen de shenling baochou ba!”
Wo [an la] shuo:“Huo a! Ni wei yi bu la xin bian liangshuang he anquan ba!”
Tamen xiang mouhai ta, er wo que shi tamen chengwei zui sunshi de.
Wo zhengjiule ta he lu te, bing shi ta lia dao wo ceng wei zhong shijie ci fu di difang qu.
Wo shangci ta [yige er zi] yi si ha ge, you jia ci ta [yige sunzi] ya gubu, wo shi tamen dou chengwei shanren.

Wo shi tamen chengwei [renlei de] lingxiu, tamen feng wo de mingling yindao [renlei] zunxing zhengdao. Wo qishi tamen:[Tamen] dangxingshangong, jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, zhi neng chongbai wo.
Wo ciyu lu te zhihui he [zongjiao] zhishi, wo zhengjiu ta tuolile zuo huaishi de chengshi [de renmin], nage chengshi de renmin que shi yi huo beini de e min.
Wo shi ta [lu te] jinru wo de enhui zhong, ta que shi yi wei shanren.
[Wo ci tongyang de enhui gei] nu ha. Ciqian, ta ceng [gao sheng] qiqiu wo, wo dayingle ta [de qiqiu], wo zhengjiu ta he ta de jiaren tuolile da nan.
Wo yuanzhu ta diyu fouren wo de jixiang de minzhong. Tamen que shi yi huo e min, suoyi, wo ba tamen dou yan sile.
[Wo ci tongyang de enhui gei] da wude he su lai man. Dang youxie zuren de yang qun yejian jinru tiandi chi zhuangjia shi, ta lia wei ci panjue, wo [an la] jianzhengle tamen suo panjue de.
Wo shi su lai man zhidao ruhe panjue, wo ci gei ta lia zhihui he zhishi. Wo shi qun shan he zhong niao sui da wude [zhu] yiqi zansong wo. Zhexie shi dou shi wo zuo de.
Wo jiaoshou ta [su lai man] wei nimen zhizao kaijia, yibian zai zhandou zhong baohu nimen. Nimen hui gan'en ma [zhu]?
[Wo] shi baofeng wei su lai man fuwu, ta feng ta de mingling chui xiang wo cengcifu di difang. Wo shi quanzhi wanshi wanwu de.
[Wo hai shi jingling zhong de] yixie emo [wei su lai man fuwu], tamen ti ta qianshui, ye zuo qita gongzuo. Wo zai jiandu tamen.
[Wo ci tongyang de enhui he zhishi gei] ai you bu [zhu]. Dangshi, ta [gao sheng] qiqiu ta de zhu:“Wo zaoyu buxingle, ni shi renci zhong zui renci de.”
Wo dayingle ta de qiqiu, wei ta jie chu liao buxing, bing ba ta [yi shisan] de jiaren ji tongyang de renshu ci hai ta,[zhe] shi cong wo jiang shi de enhui, shi dui chongbai wo de renmen de gaojie.
[Ni dang ji zhu] yi si ma yi, yi de lisi he zu le ke fu lei, quan shi jianren zhe [zhu].
Wo shi tamen jinru wo de enhui zhong, tamen que shi shanren.

[Wo ceng xianshi yi xiang enhui gei] zuo nu. Dangshi, ta zai fennu zhong chuzou, bing caixiang wo bu hui chengfa ta [jiang zainan gei ta]. Ta zai hei'an zhong [gao sheng] qiqiu wo [shuo]:“Chu ni [an la] wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu. Zanmei ni chaojue! Wo dique zuo cuole.”
Wo dayingle ta de qiqiu, zhengjiu ta tuolile zainan. Wo ruci zhengjiu xinshimen.
[Wo ceng xianshi yi xiang enhui gei] zai ke li ya. Dangshi, ta [gao sheng] qiqiu ta de zhu [shuo]:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao rang wo gudu wu si, ni shi zui hao de jicheng zhe.”

Wo dayingle ta de qiqiu, wo ci gei ta ye ha ya, bing wei ta zhiyule ta de qizi [de bu yu zheng]. Tamen chang zhengxian xing shan, bing zai xiwang yu weiju zhong qiqiu wo. Tamen dui wo shi qiangong de.

[Wo cengcifu gei] nage baochi zhenjie de nuzi [ma'er ya], wo [tongguo ji bu li lei tianshi] ba linghun chui ru ta [de xiukou] nei, bing shi ta he ta de erzi [er sa] chengwei zhong shijie de yi zhong jixiang.
Nimen de zhege zongjiao [yisilan jiao], yuan shi yige tongyi de zongjiao, er wo shi nimen de zhu, suoyi, nimen dang chongbai wo.
Dan tamen [youtai jiaotu he jidu jiaotu deng] wei jiaoyi er fenliele ziji de zongjiao [yisilan jiao]. Tamen dou jiang gui dao wo zheli lai.
Shei xingshan qie shi xinshi, shei de shangong jue bu hui bei fouren, wo dique [zai ta de shanxing bu zhong] wei ta jilu.
Fanshi wo suo huimie de chengshi [de renmin], tamen yao chong fan chenshi shi jue bu keneng de,
zhidao ya zhu zhe he ma zhu zhe bei shifang, tamen jiang cong gege gaodi cheng qun chong chu.

Zhenshi de nuoyan [fuhuo ri] linjinle.[Renlei cong fenmu zhong bei fuhuo shi, ni jiang kanjian] bu xinyang zhe de yanjing turan yin kongbu er zhi deng.[Tamen jiang shuo]:“Women zhen gaisi! Women dique hu lue liao ci shi. Bu, women shi bu yi zhe.”
Nimen [bu xinyang zhe] he nimen she an la er chongbai de dou shi huo yu de ranliao, nimen dou jiang jinru qizhong [shou huoxing].
Jiaru zhexie [ouxiang] shi zhuzai, tamen jiu bu hui jinru huo yule. Tamen jiang yong ju qizhong [shou huoxing].
Tamen jiang zai huo yu li tanxi houjiao, tamen zai nali jiang yi wu suo wen.
Fan meng wo ci fu zhe, zhexie ren jiang yuanli huo yu.
Tamen jiang ting bu dao [huo yu de] renhe shengyin, tamen jiang yong juyu tamen suo xi'ai de shenghuo zhong.
[Fuhuo ri], zuida de kongbu bu hui shi tamen youchou, tianshimen jianglai huanying tamen:“Zhe jiushi nimen suo bei xunuo de rizi.”
Zai na ri, wo jiang ba tian juan qilai, youru juan qi huajuan yiyang. Wo zuichu shi zenyang chuangzao de, wo jiang shi ta zenyang fuyuan. Zhe shi wo xu xia de nuoyan, wo yiding yao shixian [zhu].
Zai [wo xie ru]“shou baohu de xian pai”[an la nali de jingdian] hou, wo que yi zai “zai bu'er”[suoyou jingdian] zhong xie dao:“Wo shanliang de pu renmen bi jiang jicheng na tudi [leyuan zhi di].”
Dui chongbai an la de minzhong, ci [“gulanjing”] zhong que youyi xiang mingbai de qishi.
Wo paiqian ni [mu sheng], zhi weile ci min zhong shijie.
Ni shuo:“Wo suo feng dao de qishi shi: Nimen ying chongbai de zhu zhishi du yi de zhu [zhu][an la]. Nimen hui guishun an la [chengwei musilin] ma?”

Jiaru tamen [youtai jiaotu he jidu jiaotu deng] beili [yisilan jiao], name, ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Wo xiang nimen gongkai xuangao, wo bu zhidao nimen suo bei jinggao de [fuhuo ri de xingfa] shi linjin de, haishi yaoyuan de?”
[Ni shuo]:“Wulun gao sheng [gongkai] de yanyu, haishi nimen suo yincang de, ta quan zhidao.
Wo bu zhidao, zhe yexu shi dui nimen de yi zhong kaoyan he zhanshi de xiangshou.”
Ta [mu sheng] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni binggong panjue. Women de zhu shi pu ci zhi zhu [an la], qiu ta yuanzhu [women] zhansheng nimen suo wangyan de [ru an la you ernu deng].”
